content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice reverse clash, not too difficult to understand the pattern and fun to code!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It seems fun and enjoyable

Cases
* Please remove the trailing newlines from the input of the cases below:
  • Test 1
  • Validator 1
  • Test 2
  • Validator 3

* Please remove the trailing newlines from the output of the cases below:
  • Test 1
  • Validator 1
  • Test 2
  • Validator 2
  • Test 3
  • Validator 3

* Inadequate case coverage as well as some tests not similar to corresponding validators. Please revise the cases to cover these scenarios, one in each test-validator pair:
  • Repeating pattern, ends moving right at right edge
  • Repeating pattern, ends moving left at left edge
  • Repeating pattern, ends moving right at mid-column
  • Repeating pattern, ends moving left at mid-column
  • Single rightward segment only (no bounce)
  • Rightward segment + partial leftward return (incomplete bounce)
  • Rightward + full leftward segments (one full bounce, no repetition yet)

Thanks.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This is easy and good for clash of code
OK, tried to make the validators match the tests better.

Thank you. Could you please add two more pairs of cases, one for each of the following scenario?

  • Repeating pattern, ends moving left at left edge
  • Repeating pattern, ends moving right at mid-column
